description: The Tampa Bay Rays have hired Kevin Cash as the fifth manager in franchise history, it was announced Friday.

description: The Yankees acquire shortstop Didi Gregorius in three-team trade with the Diamondbacks and Tigers.

description: Free-agent reliever Andrew Miller remains employed in the AL East after reaching agreement on a contract with the Yankees on Friday.
creator: Wallace Matthews
title: Yanks add LHP Miller for 4 years, $36 million

description: Veteran pitcher Ryan Dempster retired as a member of the Chicago Cubs and will stay on with the team's front office, it was announced Friday.
creator: Jesse Rogers
title: Dempster retires, joins Cubs front office

description: Washington Nationals outfielder Jayson Werth has been convicted of reckless driving and sentenced to 10 days in jail for driving over 100 miles per hour on the Capital Beltway.
creator: Associated Press
title: Werth gets 10 days in jail for reckless driving

description: After being the odd man out in the outfield for the second half of last season, Andre Ethier has let the Los Angeles Dodgers know that he wants to play every day.
creator: ESPN.com news services
title: OF Ethier to Dodgers: Play me every day

description: Royals right-hander Luke Hochevar hopes to begin throwing off a mound later this month as he continues to rehab from Tommy John surgery that caused him to miss all of last season.

title: Royals' Hochevar to throw off mound soon

description: Had things come together last season, Nelson Cruz's introduction with the Seattle Mariners would have taken place a year ago.

title: Mariners, Cruz make 4-year deal official

description: Daisuke Matsuzaka has signed a contract with the Softbank Hawks of Japan's Pacific League after eight years in Major League Baseball.

description: Former Cubs outfielder and Tampa Bay Rays bench coach Dave Martinez will resume the same role under new manager Joe Maddon, the team announced Thursday.

description: The Rangers retained one of the mainstays of their starting rotation by signing Colby Lewis to a one-year, $4 million deal Thursday.
creator: Calvin Watkins

description: Michael Saunders says he used to daydream about playing for the Toronto Blue Jays.

description: Incoming Major League Baseball commissioner Rob Manfred has reorganized several top jobs in the sport.

description: Award-winning columnist Bryan Burwell of the St. Louis Post-Dispatch died Thursday after a brief battle with cancer. He was 59.

description: Australian Open organizers have tweaked the extreme heat policy for 2015 in the wake of complaints from players about dangerous conditions during a heat wave in Melbourne during the last tournament.

description: Austrian tennis player Yvonne Meusburger is coming out of retirement to play one more tournament -- the Australian Open in January.

description: Andy Murray is to marry long-time girlfriend Kim Sears.

description: Serena Williams will hold a run on South Beach next month for runners of all ages and abilities to support her foundation.

description:
Featherweight titlist Vasyl Lomachenko, the brilliant two-time Ukranian Olympic gold medalist regarded by many as the best amateur fighter in boxing history, is making quite a name for himself as a professional.

Lomachenko, who won a world title in only his third professional fight, made his first defense against Chonlatarn Piriyapinyo and cruised to a one-sided, unanimous decision on Saturday night at the Venetian Macao's Cotai Arena in Macau, China, (Sunday morning Macau time) on the Manny Pacquiao-Chris...
